title: Impact of TikTok Talks on U.S.-China Relations
itunes:title: Impact of TikTok Talks on U.S.-China Relations
description:
Dr. Joanne Roberts, Chief Value Officer at Providence St. Joseph Health, provides a coronavirus update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber talks about Tesla’s potential entrance into the S&P 500. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne walks through how the latest TikTok developments are intensifying the ongoing U.S.-China rivalry. Bloomberg News Seattle Bureau Chief Dina Bass talks about what a potential Microsoft deal could mean for TikTok’s presence in the U.S. And we Drive to the Close with Shawn Cruz, TD Ameritrade Manager of Trader Strategy.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
